fields.name: benchmarkTime
fields.description: Time at which the benchmark was executed

fields.name: benchmarkName
fields.description: The name identifying which benchmark test the results belong to ('File Loader', 'External Query', etc)

fields.name: job
fields.description: Information on the job performed

fields.name: id
fields.description: ID of the job

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of job run (query, load, etc)

fields.name: user
fields.description: User who executed the job

fields.name: location
fields.description: Location of the job execution

fields.name: startTime
fields.description: Time at which the job started

fields.name: endTime
fields.description: Time at which the job ended

fields.name: duration
fields.description: Duration of job in seconds

fields.name: totalSlotMs
fields.description: The total number of slot-ms consumed by the job

fields.name: avgSlots
fields.description: Average number of slots used throughout the runtime of the job

fields.name: concurrency
fields.description: Number of concurrent jobs running

fields.name: loadProperties
fields.description: Information on load jobs

fields.name: fileType
fields.description: The type of file the data is loaded from

fields.name: compressionType
fields.description: The compression type of the load file

fields.name: numColumns
fields.description: The number of columns in each load file

fields.name: columnTypes
fields.description: The distribution of load file column types

fields.name: numFiles
fields.description: The number of files loaded

fields.name: fileSize
fields.description: The size of each file loaded in MB

fields.name: stagingDataSize
fields.description: The size of the staging table used to generate each load file in MB

fields.name: destinationTable
fields.description: The name of the table the data is loaded into in <project>.<dataset>.<table_id> format

fields.name: numRows
fields.description: The number of rows in the destination table

fields.name: sourceURI
fields.description: The distribution of load file column types

fields.name: sourceFormat
fields.description: The GCS path of the load files

fields.name: queryProperties
fields.description: Information on query jobs

fields.name: query
fields.description: Executed query

fields.name: queryCategory
fields.description: Type of SQL functionality highlighted in the query: SIMPLE_SELECT, INNER_JOIN, BROADCAST_JOIN, WINDOW_FUNCTION, SUB_QUERY, CASE_STATEMENT

fields.name: totalBytesBilled
fields.description: Total bytes billed from running the query

fields.name: totalBytesProcessed
fields.description: Total bytes processed from running the query

fields.name: mainTable
fields.description: Information the table that is being queried

fields.name: tableType
fields.description: The type of table the query was run on - BQ_MANAGED, or EXTERNAL

fields.name: fileType
fields.description: The type of file if the table is EXTERNAL, NULL if table is BQ_MANAGED

fields.name: tableName
fields.description: Name of table query was run on in <project>.<dataset>.<table_id> format

fields.name: numColumns
fields.description: The number of columns in the table

fields.name: columnTypes
fields.description: The distribution of column types in the table

fields.name: equivalentBqTableSize
fields.description: The size of the BigQuery table if BQ_MANAGED, or the size of the BigQuery table the file was derived from if EXTERNAL

fields.name: fileSize
fields.description: The size of the file if EXTERNAL, NULL if BQ_MANAGED

fields.name: operationTable
fields.description: Information the table second table if a JOIN or SUBQUERY was used, NULL if query didnâ€™t contain a JOIN or SUBQUERY

fields.name: tableType
fields.description: The type of operation table the query was run on - BQ_MANAGED or EXTERNAL

fields.name: fileType
fields.description: The type of file if the operation table is EXTERNAL, NULL if table is BQ_MANAGED

fields.name: tableName
fields.description: Name of the operation table the query was run on in <project>.<dataset>.<table_id> format

fields.name: numColumns
fields.description: The number of columns in the operation table

fields.name: columnTypes
fields.description: The distribution of column types in the operation table

fields.name: equivalentBqTableSize
fields.description: The size of the BigQuery operation table if BQ_MANAGED, or the size of the BigQuery table the file was derived from if EXTERNAL

fields.name: fileSize
fields.description: The size of the file if EXTERNAL, NULL if BQ_MANAGED
